Description: Raw material intensity values from literature review
Material intensity after unit conversion
Technology name for intensity data (e.g. utility-scale solar pv)
Material name (e.g. Copper Steel Neodymium)
NREL Standard Scenario name (61 scenarios)
Projection year (2024-2050)
Installed capacity by technology (e.g. upv_MW wind_onshore_MW)
Maps capacity technologies to intensity technologies with weights
Expected operational lifetime by technology
Weight allocation for utility PV: 70% c-Si 15% CIGS 15% CdTe
Solar PV lifetime = 30 years
Wind lifetime = 25 years
Nuclear lifetime = 60 years
Hydro lifetime = 80 years
Cumulative installed capacity by technology and year
New capacity added each year
Capacity retired each year based on lifetime
Dictionary mapping (scenario technology) to StockFlowState objects
Technology mapping weights for a capacity technology
Weight for intensity technology in capacity mix
Best-fit probability distribution per (technology material) pair
Parameters of fitted distribution (loc scale shape)
Random draw from fitted distribution for one iteration
Material demand per scenario/year/material
Mean demand across all MC iterations
Standard deviation across MC iterations
2.5th percentile of MC iterations (lower bound of 95% CI)
5th percentile of MC iterations
25th percentile of MC iterations
Median (50th percentile) of MC iterations
75th percentile of MC iterations
95th percentile of MC iterations
97.5th percentile of MC iterations (upper bound of 95% CI)
Sum of aggregate material demand across all years (2026-2050)
Maximum aggregate material demand in any single year
Mean aggregate demand during early build-out period (2029-2035)
Calendar year when aggregate demand reaches maximum
Linear slope of aggregate demand over projection horizon
Ratio of early-half to late-half cumulative demand
Mean coefficient of variation across all materials
Mean relative 95% confidence interval width
Share of total capacity from solar (PV + CSP) in 2035
Calculation Formula: sum(pv + csp capacity) / sum(total capacity) at t=2035

Description: Share of total capacity from wind in 2035
Calculation Formula: sum(wind capacity) / sum(total capacity) at t=2035

Description: Share of total capacity from storage (battery + pumped hydro) in 2035
Calculation Formula: sum(battery + pumped-hydro) / sum(total capacity) at t=2035

Description: Number of materials with non-zero demand in scenario
Demand-weighted average of import dependency × CRC risk
Maximum annual supply chain stress index
Mean number of materials exceeding US production per year
Maximum materials exceeding US production in any year
Cumulative demand weighted by import dependency
Per-year supply chain stress for a scenario (list)
Calculation Formula: sum(demand × import_dep × CRC_norm) / total_demand for each year

Description: Per-year count of materials exceeding US production (list)
Calculation Formula: count(materials where demand > US_production) for each year

Description: Per-year import-exposed demand (list)
Single-year supply chain stress value
Combined risk weight per material
Import dependency vector aligned to all materials
Normalized CRC risk vector (0-8 scale → 0-1)
US production vector aligned to all materials
Pivoted demand matrix (scenario×year rows × material columns)
Mean demand across all scenarios and years
Maximum demand across all scenarios and years
Coefficient of variation across scenario totals
Mean relative 95% confidence interval width
Calculation Formula: mean((p97 - p2) / mean) grouped by material

Description: Mean temporal volatility (std across years)
Linear demand growth rate over time
Number of scenarios with non-zero demand
Average annual US production
Net import reliance fraction
CRC-weighted average of import sources
Mean scenario demand relative to US production
Maximum scenario demand relative to US production
Fraction of scenarios where demand exceeds production
Total projected demand from 2026-2050 (median across scenarios)
Percentage of global reserves consumed by 2050 energy transition
Ratio of US reserves to cumulative transition demand
Ratio of global reserves to cumulative transition demand
Fraction of global reserves in high-risk countries
Fraction of global reserves in OECD + US
Fraction of global reserves in China
Fraction of imports from China
Fraction of imports from high-risk countries
Fraction of imports from OECD countries
Herfindahl-Hirschman Index of import concentration
Average net import reliance across years
CRC-weighted average of import sources normalized to 0-1
Chinas share of total imports
HHI of import source countries
Country Risk Classification weights for geopolitical risk scoring
Peak demand allocated to each CRC sourcing category
Calculation Formula: peak × domestic_share (for US) or peak × import_dep × (CRC_share/total)

Description: Years of reserves in each CRC geographic category
US annual production overlay marker
US annual consumption overlay marker
Features after log10(x+1) transformation
Features after z-score standardization
Variance Inflation Factor for multicollinearity
Random seed for reproducibility
Range of cluster numbers to test
Number of k-means random initializations
Maximum allowed VIF before dropping feature (legacy — not used in SPCA pipeline)
Five sparse principal components for materials: Demand Scale / Geopolitical Risk / Reserve Geography / Import Concentration / Capacity Stress
Calculation Formula: SparsePCA(n_components=5 alpha=2.0) on standardized material features

Description: Four sparse principal components for scenarios: Demand Scale & Wind / Demand Uncertainty / Supply Chain Stress / Solar & Storage Mix
Calculation Formula: SparsePCA(n_components=4 alpha=1.0) on standardized scenario features

Description: Five latent factors for materials extracted by FactorAnalysis
Calculation Formula: FactorAnalysis(n_components=5 max_iter=1000) on standardized material features

Description: Four latent factors for scenarios extracted by FactorAnalysis
Calculation Formula: FactorAnalysis(n_components=4 max_iter=1000) on standardized scenario features

Description: Fraction of feature variance explained by latent factors
Calculation Formula: sum(loading_ij²) across all factors j for feature i

Description: Feature-specific noise variance not explained by factors
Adjusted Rand Index between cluster labels from two methods
Evenness of cluster sizes
Minimum silhouette score for valid clustering
Minimum Adjusted Rand Index for stability
Material intensity values by technology from literature review
NREL Standard Scenarios 2024 capacity projections
Multi-sheet workbook with supply chain risk data
Calculation Formula: Sheets: aggregate import_dependency import_shares reserves crc

Description: Annual production/import/export/consumption by material
Calculation Formula: Columns: material year production import export consumption net_import

Description: Net import reliance percentage by year
Calculation Formula: Columns: material year1 year2... (values in % or E for exporter)

Description: Import shares by source country
Economic reserves by country (kt)
Country Risk Classification ratings
USGS 2023 individual material CSVs for thin-film materials
Calculation Formula: Contains: USprod_* NIR columns for Cd Ga Ge In Se Te

Description: Monte Carlo simulation output
Calculation Formula: Columns: scenario year material mean std p2 p5 p25 p50 p75 p95 p97

Description: Technology-level demand contributions per material
Calculation Formula: Columns: material technology intensity_t_per_mw total_capacity_mw expected_demand_tonnes pct_contribution

Description: Mean within-scenario variance (intensity uncertainty from MC)
Calculation Formula: mean(std²) across scenarios and years for each material

Description: Between-scenario variance (scenario assumption uncertainty)
Total variance (within + between)
Percentage of variance from intensity uncertainty
Percentage of variance from scenario uncertainty
Elasticity of demand to intensity change for each tech-material pair
Calculation Formula: pct_contribution_normalized (contribution share sums to 1 per material)

Description: Variance decomposition results by material
Calculation Formula: Columns: material within_var between_var total_var within_pct between_pct mean_demand

Description: Intensity elasticity results for each tech-material pair
Calculation Formula: Columns: material technology intensity_t_per_mw expected_demand_tonnes pct_contribution_raw elasticity

Description: Variance decomposition by material and year
Calculation Formula: Columns: material year within_var between_var total_var within_pct between_pct mean_demand

Description: Spearman rank correlation coefficient between sampled intensity and resulting demand
P-value for Spearman correlation significance test
Absolute value of Spearman rho for ranking importance
Whether Spearman correlation is statistically significant
Direction of correlation: positive negative or none
Calculation Formula: positive if rho > 0 else negative if rho < 0 else none

Description: Human-readable interpretation of correlation strength
Intensity technology for which correlation was computed
Material for which correlation was computed
Material whose demand is being correlated with (same as material in this analysis)
Sampled intensity value for (technology material) at each iteration
Resulting total demand for material at each iteration
Calculation Formula: sum(additions × intensity × weight) across all scenarios/years/technologies

Description: Monte Carlo iteration number (0-indexed)
Spearman rank correlation results for sensitivity analysis
Calculation Formula: Columns: technology material target_material spearman_rho p_value abs_rho significant direction interpretation

Description: Raw iteration data with sampled intensities and resulting demands
Number of MC iterations for Spearman sensitivity analysis (default 1000)
Calculation Formula: 1000 (lower than main MC for computational efficiency)

Description: Stacked horizontal bar chart showing technology contributions to material demand
Calculation Formula: Technology breakdown by material (cumulative across scenarios)

Description: Stacked area chart showing capacity projections by technology group
Calculation Formula: Capacity (GW) by year grouped by technology type

Description: Stacked bar chart showing annual capacity additions by technology
Violin plots showing material intensity distributions from literature review
Calculation Formula: n sample size mean median per material

Description: Pairwise scatterplot matrix for scenario features
Pairwise scatterplot matrix for material features
Correlation heatmap for scenario features
Calculation Formula: Lower triangle heatmap with r values

Description: Correlation heatmap for material features
Calculation Formula: Lower triangle heatmap with r values

Description: Clustering analysis visualizations (elbow pca_biplot silhouette cluster_profiles)
Exploratory data analysis visualizations (scatterplots correlations)
Publication-quality figures (fig2 figs1 figs3 styles)
Supply chain risk visualizations (risk ranking heatmap)
Clustering results (features clusters profiles VIF)
Sensitivity analysis results (technology contributions)
Clustering method comparison visualizations
Clustering comparison metrics and label CSVs
Factor Analysis scores for scenarios/materials
Factor Analysis loading matrix
Calculation Formula: Rows: features; Columns: FA1 FA2 ... FAn

Description: Factor Analysis communalities per feature
Clustering comparison metrics per method
Calculation Formula: Columns: method n_input_features optimal_k silhouette stability_ari ...

Description: 4x4 pairwise ARI matrix between methods
Calculation Formula: Rows/Columns: VIF-Pruned PCA Sparse PCA Factor Analysis

Description: Entity cluster labels per method
Calculation Formula: Columns: entity VIF-Pruned PCA Sparse PCA Factor Analysis

Description: Human-readable clustering comparison summary with recommendation
Calculation Formula: Method comparison tables + pairwise ARI + recommendation

Description: Inventory of all visualizations with input variables and data sources
Calculation Formula: Columns: Visualization Name / Output Path / Category / X-axis / Y-axis / Color / Additional Variables / Data Source / Script
